snippet: The guidelines from the nation’s leading heart organizations will fundamentally reshape the use of cholesterol-lowering statin medicines now prescribed for a quarter of Americans over 40.
abstract: Nation’s leading heart organizations release new guidelines fundamentally reshaping use of cholesterol-lowering statin medicines; patients on statins will no longer need to lower cholesterol levels to specific numerical targets, but will simply take right dose; previously, emphasis on lowering cholesterol levels by specific amounts meant patients not hitting target levels with statins alone were often prescribed additional drugs.
lead_paragraph: The guidelines from the nation’s leading heart organizations will fundamentally reshape the use of cholesterol-lowering statin medicines now prescribed for a quarter of Americans over 40.

headline.main: Experts Reshape Treatment Guide for Cholesterol
